remarks.format:
## Remarks F:System.Windows.GridUnitType.Star?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True sizing is used to distribute available space by weighted proportions.
In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], star values are expressed as * or 2\*. In the first case, the row or column would receive one times the available space; in the second case, the row or column would receive two times the available space, and so on.
